ACT
80
Proportional reduction of records ordered to the testamentary heir or recorder ( legatee )
A testamentary heir, whose part of the inheritance would have to be reduced in order to supplement the necessary part, may request a proportional reduction of the records that he needs to fill out, if nothing else follows from the will.
The provision from paragraph 1 of this article shall be applied in an appropriate manner also for the recorder who was instructed by the testator to fill in something from his record.
